content: Hi y'all, I'm trying to contribute something to library/core. I've cloned the repo, checked out 1.57.0 so I don't have to build the compiler, but cargo +nightly build --manifest-path library/core/Cargo.toml produces errors, e.g. "the trait Clone is not implemented for [u8; 4]"
I assume that's not the right cargo invocation, what is?
@Robert Bastian you don't need to build the compiler on master either - try git checkout master then x.py check library/std
